documentation.label: Insert File Contents to SQL Table
documentation.description: This script inserts the given file contents into the target SQL Table obtaining an existing connection from the app server.

documentation.label: Source File Path
documentation.description: The file path to source the data.

documentation.label: JNDI
documentation.description: JNDI corresponding to a data source available to the app server context.

documentation.label: Table Name
documentation.description: The data base table name to insert the data.

documentation.label: Data Type Mapping
documentation.description: A list separated by pipes to indicate the data type names that should match the file column names to indicate the data type in the target table, date objects must be written following this pattern: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: A number to specify the batch size for the insert statements to issue to the data base.

documentation.label: Log File
documentation.description: Path to a file where additional information will be specified regarding the current process.

documentation.label: Delimiter
documentation.description: The character to use to enclose values that contain the separator character.

documentation.label: Separator
documentation.description: The separator character, to separate column values within the file contents.

documentation.label: Escape
documentation.description: The escape character to use to escape delimiter values in case that the delimiter value is found in the value. If no value is specified, then each delimiter character occurrence will be escaped by preceding it once with the same delimiter character (this will cause the value to be enclosed by the delimiter character as well).

documentation.label: Charset
documentation.description: A supported java.nio.charset.Charset charset.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Write Query Result Set to Table
documentation.description: This script runs a query to specify records to be inserted in the specified table using a result set produced by an Apache Calcite Query Syntax issued to EBX and a specific field Mapping.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: The data space identifier where the update would take place.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: The data set name where the table to be updated is found.

documentation.label: Table Path
documentation.description: The table path to execute the delete operation.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: Indicates how many records to delete in a single transaction, a negative number would mean to contain all records in a single transaction.

documentation.label: Additional Data Sets
documentation.description: A list of data sets in the form: DataSpace;DataSet;Alias, separated by pipe character, example, if two more data sets are needed for the base query to run, then: DataSpace1;DataSet1;Alias1|DataSpace2;DataSet2;Alias2, would be a valid syntax to specify additional data sets.

documentation.label: Base Query
documentation.description: An Apache Calcite SQL Query that should contain a projection representing the primary key values for records to be updated along with the values that will be used to update records in the corresponding table, an additional parameter is needed, that should match with a list of fields corresponding to the table to match by position.

documentation.label: Table Attributes
documentation.description: A list separated by a pipe character that correspond to the attributes in the table, this list must be in the same order as the list that corresponds to the query attributes to match by position.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Query to Insert Records
documentation.description: This script runs a query to specify records to be inserted in a table using a result set produced by an Apache Calcite Query Syntax issued to EBX.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: The data space identifier where the write would take place.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: The data set name where the table to be written is found.

documentation.label: Table Path
documentation.description: The table path to execute the write operation.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: Indicates how many records to read from the underlying result set.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: Indicates how many records to modify in a single transaction, a negative number would mean to contain all records in a single transaction.

documentation.label: Additional Data Sets
documentation.description: A list of data sets in the form: DataSpace;DataSet;Alias, separated by pipe character, example, if two more data sets are needed for the base query to run, then: DataSpace1;DataSet1;Alias1|DataSpace2;DataSet2;Alias2, would be a valid syntax to specify additional data sets.

documentation.label: Base Query
documentation.description: An Apache Calcite SQL Query that should contain a projection representing the records to be read for insert, the projection should contain named columns (may be separated by slash for fields within groups).

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Query to Update Records
documentation.description: This script runs a query to specify records to be updated in a table using a result set produced by an Apache Calcite Query Syntax issued.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: The data space identifier where the update would take place.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: The data set name where the table to be updated is found.

documentation.label: Table Path
documentation.description: The table path to execute the write operation.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: Indicates how many records to write in a single transaction, a negative number would mean to contain all records in a single transaction.

documentation.label: Additional Data Sets
documentation.description: A list of data sets in the form: DataSpace;DataSet;Alias, separated by pipe character, example, if two more data sets are needed for the base query to run, then: DataSpace1;DataSet1;Alias1|DataSpace2;DataSet2;Alias2, would be a valid syntax to specify additional data sets.

documentation.label: Base Query
documentation.description: An Apache Calcite SQL Query that should contain a projection representing the primary key values for records to be updated along with the values that will be used to update records in the corresponding table, an additional parameter is needed, that should match with a list of fields corresponding to the table to match by position.

documentation.label: Query Attributes
documentation.description: A list separated by a pipe character that correspond to the attributes in the projection (must not include double quotes), this list must be in the same order as the list that corresponds to the destination columns in the table.

documentation.label: Table Attributes
documentation.description: A list separated by a pipe character that correspond to the attributes in the table, this list must be in the same order as the list that corresponds to the query attributes to match by position.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Query to Delete Records
documentation.description: This script runs a query to specify records to be deleted from a table using Apache Calcite Query Syntax.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: The data space identifier where the deletion would take place.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: The data set name where the table to be deleted is found.

documentation.label: Table Path
documentation.description: The table path to execute the delete operation.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: Indicates how many records to delete in a single transaction, a negative number would mean to contain all records in a single transaction.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: A hint to the underlying connection to indicate how many records prefetch for a result set.

documentation.label: Base Query
documentation.description: An Apache Calcite SQL Query that should contain a projection representing the primary key values for records to be deleted.

documentation.label: File to Log
documentation.description: Full path to a file to write trace logs.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Foreign Key Alignment for Insert (Match)
documentation.description: This script inserts records from a link table on a specified target table where a relationship is stated between two entities to reflect the result after applying match and merge rules to the specified "source table" to re-align references to newly generated golden records.

documentation.label: Data Space Source Table
documentation.description: This is the data space where the soure table will be found. The source table is the table that is the source for the foreign keys in the link table to be align.

documentation.label: Data Set Source Table
documentation.description: This is the data set where the source table will be found. The source table is the table that is the source for the foreign keys in the link table to be align.

documentation.label: Source Table Path
documentation.description: Path to a table that exports its key to the link table to define a many to many relationship with another table, this source table must contain a field that specifies a target record in regards to golden record belonging, this is, if previously one record was related to another record in the link table and after a matching process it was determined that now this is a merged record, then the relationship must be updated so that it points now to the referred golden record.

documentation.label: Data Space Link Table
documentation.description: This is the data space where the link table will be found. The link table is the table that contains the foreign keysto the source table.

documentation.label: Data Set Link Table
documentation.description: This is the data set where the link table will be found. The link table is the table that contains the foreign keysto the source table.

documentation.label: Link Table Path
documentation.description: Path to a table that holds imported keys from two different tables to associate values in both directions, this table would be updated to reflect a foreign key alignment between two tables that went through a matching process and golden records were determined.

documentation.label: Foreign Key to Source Table
documentation.description: Field path in the link table to the Source Table.

documentation.label: Target Record Field
documentation.description: Field path in the source table where the "target record" value would be stored.

documentation.label: Data Space to Target Link Table
documentation.description: This is the data space where the target link table will be found. The result will be written in this table to avoid long update periods.

documentation.label: Data Set to Target Link Table
documentation.description: This is the data set where the target link table will be found. The result will be written in this table to avoid long update periods.

documentation.label: Link Table Path
documentation.description: Path to a table that will contain the alignment result, this should have the same exact structure as the original link table (this would be just another data set and data space from the very same data model, but an empty one).

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: The number of records to hold for each programmatic service execution, adjusting this value would have an impact in performance and resource usage.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Aggregate Child Values Over A Link Table for Insert
documentation.description: This actually updates... Following is previous text. This script inserts the result of collecting specific field values from child records over a Link Table, writing to the specified "Field to Hold Aggregated Values" a list joined by using a pipe character as separator (as if it was a csv formatted column, there is a specific delimiter like double quotes if the value contains the separator character: |) to the specified target table. The value is generated by grouping the values found in the child table for a each record in the main table, for example, for some Customer and Telephone tables, if there is a link table called Customer_Telephone, then if the Customer table has a field called "Telephone Numbers": for each record in the Customer table, this script task will write a list of IDs that correspond to Primary Key values in the Telephone table in the "Telephone Numbers" field that are related to the current Customer record (if any) separating them with a pipe character according to what is found in the "Customer_Tepehone" table.

documentation.label: Parent Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space where the parent table will be found.

documentation.label: Parent Table Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set where the parent table will be found.

documentation.label: Parent Table Path
documentation.description: Path to the parent table.

documentation.label: Primary Key Columns
documentation.description: A list of column names separated by a pipe character "|" (without double quotes) to specify the columns that conform the primary key that corresponds to the table to be updated (parent table).

documentation.label: Grouping Columns
documentation.description: A list of column names separated by a pipe character "|" (without double quotes) to specify the columns that conform the values to be appended and then aggregated.

documentation.label: Additional Data Sets
documentation.description: A list of data sets in the form: DataSpace;DataSet;Alias, separated by pipe character, example, if two more data sets are needed for the base query to run, then: DataSpace1;DataSet1;Alias1|DataSpace2;DataSet2;Alias2, would be a valid syntax to specify additional data sets.

documentation.label: Field to Store Aggregation
documentation.description: This is the field path in the "parent table" to store the aggregated result (the primary key column serves as groping condition actually).

documentation.label: Base Query
documentation.description: A base query to specify the result set to process in order to assamble the aggregated values, this proyection must contain the primary key columns that would map to the primary key in the "parent table" and the "grouping columns" that are the actual columns to be appended and then aggregated in a list separated by "separator" string and then written in the "target column" in the table as update.

documentation.label: Separator
documentation.description: A string to be used to separate appended values, for example, if there are more columns specified to be aggregated in the query, those columns will be appended and separated by a pipe character "|" by default, then if more than one value (once appended) corresponds to a single parent table primary key value, then those distinct values will be also appended and separated by this character sequence (it is recommended to use on single character as separator, if the content to be appended contains this character sequence then those characters will be escaped by preceding them with a backwards diagonal).

documentation.label: Ignore Repeated Values
documentation.description: Write "true" (without double quotes) if the aggregated values should not contain repeated values, leave blank or write "false" (without double quotes) to allow any child value in the aggregated string.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: The number of records to process per single Programmatic Service execution.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Foreign Key Alignment (Match)
documentation.description: This script updates records from a link table where a relationship is stated between two entities to reflect the result after applying match and merge rules to the specified "source table" to reflect alignment to generated golden records.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space where the soure and link tables will be found.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set where the source and link tables will be found.

documentation.label: Source Table Path
documentation.description: Path to a table that exports its key to the link table to define a many to many relationship with another table, this source table must contain a field that specifies a target record in regards to golden record belonging, this is, if previously one record was related to another record in the link table and after a matching process it was determined that now this is a merged record, then the relationship must be updated so that it points now to the referred golden record.

documentation.label: Link Table Path
documentation.description: Path to a table that holds imported keys from two different tables to associate values in both directions, this table would be updated to reflect a foreign key alignment between two tables that went through a matching process and golden records were determined.

documentation.label: Foreign Key to Source Table
documentation.description: Field path in the link table to the Source Table.

documentation.label: Target Record Field
documentation.description: Field path in the source table where the "target record" value would be stored.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Aggregate Child Values Over A Link Table
documentation.description: This script updates records from a "Parent Table" over a Link Table, writing in the specified "Field to Hold Aggregated Values" a list joined by using a pipe character as separator (as if it was a csv formatted column, there is a specific delimiter like double quotes if the value contains the separator character: |), grouping the values found in the child table through the link table, this is, for some Customer and Telephone tables, if there is a link table called Customer_Telephone, then if the Customer table has a field called "Telephone Numbers": for each record in the Customer table, this script task will write a list of IDs that correspond to Primary Key values in the Telephone table in the "Telephone Numbers" field that are related to the current Customer record (if any).

documentation.label: Parent Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space where the parent table will be found.

documentation.label: Parent Table Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set where the parent table will be found.

documentation.label: Parent Table Path
documentation.description: Path to the parent table.

documentation.label: Field to Hold Aggregation
documentation.description: This is a relative field path in the parent table where the aggregation result will be stored.

documentation.label: Link Table Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space where the link table will be found.

documentation.label: Link Table Data Set
documentation.description: Data set where the link table will be found.

documentation.label: Link Table Path
documentation.description: Path to the link table.

documentation.label: FK to Parent Table
documentation.description: A relative field path in the Link Table that corresponds to the foreign key to the child table.

documentation.label: FK to Child Table
documentation.description: A relative field path in the Link Table that corresponds to the foreign key to the child table.

documentation.label: Ignore Repeated Values
documentation.description: Write "true" (without double quotes) if the aggregated values should not contain repeated values, leave blank or write "false" (without double quotes) to allow any child value in the aggregated string.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Internal EBX Query to CSV
documentation.description: This script runs an internal Calcite query and exports the result set to a csv file in the EBX server.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space that contains the data set where the Query Builder will be instantiated.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set where the Query Builder will be instantiated.

documentation.label: Additional Data Sets
documentation.description: A list of data sets in the form: DataSpace;DataSet;Alias, separated by pipe character, example, if two more data sets are needed for the base query to run, then: DataSpace1;DataSet1;Alias1|DataSpace2;DataSet2;Alias2, would be a valid syntax to specify additional data sets.

documentation.label: Query
documentation.description: A query expression containing valid Calcite Syntax in the scope of the specified data set (Please use a data context variable to specify this value to avoid reading problems internally).

documentation.label: File Path
documentation.description: This is the full file name to a valid file system location (internal to EBX server). This file should be retrieved from the server through ssh or an sftp server, etc.

documentation.label: File Delimiter
documentation.description: This is the file delimiter for values, commonly the " is used, if left blank, then no delimiter will be used.

documentation.label: File Separator
documentation.description: This is the file separator for values, commonly the comma is used, if left blank, then semi colon will be used.

documentation.label: Escape Character
documentation.description: This is the file escape character for values, commonly the back slash is used, if left blank, then no escape character will be used and delimiters will be escaped by duplicating the delimiter to represent an escaped delimiter value.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: A hint to the underlying data access to prefetch records to iterate the result set.

documentation.label: Charset
documentation.description: The charset to use for the exported csv file.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Aggregate Child Values to Field
documentation.description: This script brings to a single field multiple values found in a child table through an association present in the specified table.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space that contains the table that will hold the result.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set that contains the table that will hold the result.

documentation.label: Table Path
documentation.description: This is the Path to the working table (where the result is going to be stored).

documentation.label: Child Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space that contains the child table that will hold the records that need to be aggregated. Should be left blank if this child table is within the same data set as the parent table.

documentation.label: Child Table Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set that contains the table that will hold the records that need to be aggregated. Should be left blank if this child table is within the same data set as the parent table.

documentation.label: Child Table Path
documentation.description: Path to the Child Table that references a Child Table that should contain the "Target Field to Aggregate". There should be an association from the parent table to this child table (even if this is in a ifferent data space).

documentation.label: Target Field to Aggregate
documentation.description: The target field in the child table that will be aggregated (if multiple fields are needed to be aggregated then it is recommended to append them to a single field).

documentation.label: Field to Store Aggregation
documentation.description: The field in the "Working Table" (table pointed to by the "Path to Table" parameter) that will contain a JSON Array of values corresponding to the aggregation.

documentation.label: Ignore Duplicates
documentation.description: This parameter is used to specify wether to allow or not duplicated values in therms of the "Target Field to Aggregate" among the child records .

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Perform Column Data Validation
documentation.description: This script runs the specific logic defined within the Technical Metadata Data Set in regards to validate a specific table column (a column corresponding to a specific tabla in a schema and catalog that in turn come from a specific Server to which a JNDI name is specified).

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: This is the data space that contains the table that will hold the validation result.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set that contains the table that will hold the validation result.

documentation.label: Working Table
documentation.description: This is the Path to the working table (where the validation result is going to be stored).

documentation.label: Working Table Record ID
documentation.description: This value corresponds to the primary key within the table that will hold the validation result (this value is meant to be specified as part of the User Service that may launch this workflow).

documentation.label: Column to Store Validation Result
documentation.description: This is the path within the Result Table that will hold the validation result.

documentation.label: Column to Store Number of Processed Records
documentation.description: This is the path within the Result Table that will hold the number of records processed.

documentation.label: Column to Store Number of Valid Records
documentation.description: This is the path within the Result Table that will hold the number of valid records.

documentation.label: Column to Store Number of Invalid Records
documentation.description: This is the path within the Result Table that will hold the number of invalid records.

documentation.label: Data Validation Key
documentation.description: This is a value that corresponds to a foreign key to the Data Validation Configuration table within Technical Metadata (this value is meant to be specified as part of the User Service that may launch this workflow).

documentation.label: Technical Metadata Data Space
documentation.description: The Technical Metadata Data Space Identifier, this data space may contain the Technical Metadata Data Set where the Data Validation Structures exist.

documentation.label: Technical Metadata Data Set
documentation.description: The Technical Metadata Data Set Identifier, this data set may contain the Data Validation Structures exist.

documentation.label: Decimal Positions
documentation.description: Number of Decimal Positions to be used to report the result.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: A value that provides a hint to the underlying data base as of how many rows prefetch in memory to supply the requested result set.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Request Type
documentation.description: This indicates the request type and must match the input data. Allowed values are: 1001 -> Full Capture (only Server ID is needed). 1002 -> Schema Captue (Server ID and Schema Name with optionally Catalog are needed). 1003 -> Table Capture (Server ID, Schema, optonally Catalog and Table names are required). 1004 -> Column Capture (Server ID, Schema, optionally Catalog, Table and Column names are required). 1005 -> Catalog (Server ID and Catalog names are required)

documentation.description: Espacio de Datos que contiene las tablas en donde se registrarn los resultados del perfilado.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set that contains the profiling summary table to register the profiling results.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set que contiene las tablas para registrar el resultado del perfilado de la columna.

documentation.label: Profile Summary Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the summarized profile results.

documentation.label: Tabla de Resumen de Perfilado
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr datos resumidos del resultado del perfilado, como nmero de valores distintos, patrones distintos, valores mximos, valores mnimos, etc.

documentation.label: Data Type Table
documentation.description: This table should contain the data type distribution calculated from the column profile, this would contain information about the percentage of string, empty, integer, decimal and so on according to the thata that contains.

documentation.label: Tabla de Tipo de Dato
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr la distribucin en porcentaje del tipo de dato encontrado en los datos de la columna; cul es el porcentaje de valores enteros, numricos, de fecha, vacos o "string" de entre los datos perfilados.

documentation.label: Suggested Actions Table
documentation.description: This table should contain the DQ suggested actions according to the data found for the profiled column.

documentation.label: Tabla de Acciones Sugeridas
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr la sugerencia de acciones de calidad de datos para la tabla de acuerdo con los valores encontrados en ella.

documentation.label: Pattern Table
documentation.description: This table should contain the regex (regular expression) to use to count occurrences in the data. For each regex, a new entry will be added to the profile summary table indicating its frequency. This table should contain a foreign key to "Field Table", and the field name should be indicated in "Pattern Table FK" parameter.

documentation.label: Tabla Patrones
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr las expresiones regulares (regex, en ingls), que sern tomadas en cuenta como parte del perfilamiento para entregar la cantidad de ocurrencias que estas tienen en los valores perfilados, dicha tabla debe contener una columna que sea llave fornea hacia la tabla "Columna", dicho nombre de columna debe ser indicado en el atributo "Tabla Patrones - Llave Fornea".

documentation.label: Pattern Table Field
documentation.description: Indicates the field that contains the regex to use within the "Pattern Table".

documentation.label: Tabla Patrones - Patrn
documentation.description: Este atributo indica el nombre de la columna dentro de la tabla de Patrones que contiene los valores de las expresiones regulares a ser medidas como parte del proceso del perfilado.

documentation.label: Tokenization Catalog Table
documentation.description: Indicates the XPath to the Table where specific tokenization catalog table per field is defined.

documentation.label: Tabla Catlogo de Tokenizacin
documentation.description: Especifica el XPath hacia la tabla que especifica particularmente cul catlogo de tokenizacin se debe aplicar a una columna dada.

documentation.label: Pattern Table FK
documentation.description: Indicates the field name that is a foreign key to the "Field Table".

documentation.label: Tabla Patrones - Llave Fornea
documentation.description: Este atributo indica el nombre de la columna dentro de la tabla de Patrones hacia la tabla "Columna".

documentation.label: Pattern Table Description
documentation.description: Indicates the field name that is the description that corresponds to the regex.

documentation.label: Tabla Patrones - Columna de Descripcin
documentation.description: Este atributo indica el nombre de la columna dentro de la tabla de Patrones que contiene la explicacin del regex.

documentation.label: Token Pattern - Data Space Field
documentation.description: The field that contains the data space where the valid token patterns table is located.

documentation.label: Patrn de Token - Columna Data Space
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que indica el espacio de datos en donde se encontrar la tabla con los patrones de token vlidos.

documentation.label: Token Pattern - Data Set Field
documentation.description: The field that contains the data set where the valid token patterns table is located.

documentation.label: Patrn de Token - Columna Data Set
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que indica el "data set" en donde se encontrar la tabla con los patrones de token vlidos.

documentation.label: Token Pattern Table Path
documentation.description: Table Path to Token Pattern Catalog Table.

documentation.label: Patrn de Tokenizacin - Table Path
documentation.description: Ruta hacia la tabla con la configuracin de las rutas hacia catlogos de Tokenizacin.

documentation.label: Token Pattern - Table Field
documentation.description: The field that contains the table path to the valid token pattern table to use to verify each contextual pattern.

documentation.label: Patrn de Token - Ruta a Tabla
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que indica la ruta a la tabla que contiene los valores de patrones de token vlidos a usar.

documentation.label: Token Pattern - Valid Patterns Field
documentation.description: The field that indicates the field within the referenced pattern table that contains the valid token patterns.

documentation.label: Patrn de Token - Column de Patrones Vlidos
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que indica, dentro de la tabla referenciada, el nombre de la columna que contiene los valores vlidos de patrones de tokens.

documentation.label: Token Pattern - FK
documentation.description: The foreign key field to the "Field" table.

documentation.label: Patrn de Token - Llave Fornea
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que es llave fornea hacia la tabla "Columna".

documentation.label: Temporary Directory
documentation.description: This is a directory that would help with the external sorting algorithms to complete the data profiling for the column values.

documentation.label: Directorio Temporal
documentation.description: Esta es una ruta dentro del sistema operativo que servir de rea de trabajo para el "ordenamiento externo" de los datos para poder llevar a cabo el perfilado de la columna.

documentation.label: Cat Token Data Space Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the data space name where the token catalog resides that would be used to tokenize the values found within the column.

documentation.label: Columna de Espacio de Datos de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el nombre Espacio de Datos que contendr la tabla catlogo de tokenizacin a usar durante el perfilamiento para encontrar patrones contextuales.

documentation.label: Cat Token Data Set Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the data set identifier to indicate where the token catalog resides that would be used to tokenize the values found within the column.

documentation.label: Data Set de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el identificador Data Set que contendr la tabla catlogo de tokenizacin a usar durante el perfilamiento para encontrar patrones contextuales.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the Cat Token Table path to the table that contains the contextual tokens to be used to define patterns within the data when profiling.

documentation.label: Tabla de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica la ruta hacia la tabla de Catlogo de Tokens que contendrn la representacin contextual a usar en los datos durante el perfilado para detectar patrones e informacin acicional.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Data Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains in turn the Field name within the Cat Token Table that contains the data value.

documentation.label: Columna de Dato del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el nombre de la columna que a su vez contiene el Nombre de la columna de la tabla del catlogo de tokens que conteiene el dato. Se trata del nombre de la columna dentro de la tabla asociada al perfilado que indicar el nombre de la columna en el catlogo de tokens que guarda el valor a contextualizar.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Token Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains in turn the Field name within the Cat Token Table that contains the token value.

documentation.label: Columna de Token del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el nombre de la columna que a su vez contiene el Nombre de la columna de la tabla del catlogo de tokens que conteiene el token para el dato correspondiente. Se trata del nombre de la columna dentro de la tabla asociada al perfilado que indicar el nombre de la columna en el catlogo de tokens que guarda el token contextual.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table FK
documentation.description: The field name that contains the foreign key to the "Field" table to associate the specific tokenization table to the column when profiling.

documentation.label: Columna de Llave Fornea del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que contiene la llave fornea hacia la tabla "Columna" para asociar la tabla de tokenizacin al perfilar.

documentation.label: Default Token Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space to use as default for a data tokenization catalog.

documentation.label: Data Space de Token Predeterminado
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos predeterminado para el catlogo de tokenizacin de datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set to use as default for a data tokenization catalog.

documentation.label: Data Set de Token Predeterminado
documentation.description: Conjunto de Datos predeterminado para el catlogo de tokenizacin de datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Table
documentation.description: Data Tokenization Catalog to use as default.

documentation.label: Tabla de Tokenizacin Predeterminada
documentation.description: Tabla de Tokenizacin Predeterminada a usar para el perfilado de Datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Table Data Field
documentation.description: The field within the default catalog token table that contains the data for which a specific token is specified.

documentation.label: Columna Dato de Tabla de Tokens Predeterminada
documentation.description: La columna de que contiene el dato para el cual se especifica un token dentro del catlogo de tokenizacin predeterminado.

documentation.label: Default Token Table Token Field
documentation.description: The field within the default catalog token table that contains the token for the corresponding data values.

documentation.label: Columna Token Tabla de Tokens Predeterminada
documentation.description: La columna de que contiene el token que se especifica para un valor dentro del catlogo de tokenizacin predeterminado.

documentation.label: Filter by Clause
documentation.description: Filter expression to use to filter out data to profile.

documentation.label: Expresin de filtro
documentation.description: Expresin de filtro a usar para determinar los datos a perfilar.

documentation.label: Bytes per Buffer
documentation.description: This is a number of bytes that serves as a limit for the ammount of values that can be stored before sorting them and send them to a file.

documentation.label: Bytes por Buffer
documentation.description: Cantidad en bytes que sirve de lmite para saber en qu momento ordenar la data recolectada antes de enviarla a un archivo.

documentation.label: Message
documentation.description: Variable that contains messages that help to know details of how the process finished.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Output Column Directory Abs Path
documentation.description: Absolute Path of the working directory created to store sorted data.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Values Processed
documentation.description: Indicates the ammount of records processed for the field.

documentation.label: Valores Procesados
documentation.description: Cantidad de valores Procesados para la columna.

documentation.label: Column Profile Data Sort
documentation.description: Step that continues the profiling process into sorting the data to obtain a top frequency by value.

documentation.label: Ordenamiento de Datos de Perfilado de Columna
documentation.description: Etapa que contina con el perfilado de columna ordenando los datos para obtener un top descendente de valores por frecuencia, patrones y smbolos.

documentation.label: Ordenamiento de Datos de Perfilado de Columna
documentation.description: Etapa que contina con el perfilado de columna ordenando los datos para obtener un top descendente de valores por frecuencia, patrones y smbolos..

documentation.label: Database Column
documentation.description: Column to be profiled.

documentation.label: Columna
documentation.description: Columna a ser Perfilada.

documentation.label: Column Name Value
documentation.description: Variable that contains the Primary Key value to be used to update distinct counts over values, patterns and special characters.

documentation.label: Valor de Nombre de Columna
documentation.description: Valor de Nombre de Columna obtenido del paso anterior a ser usado para actualizar con ello las cantidades de valores distintos, patrones distintos y caracteres especiales distintos.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: EBX data space that contains the profiling summary table to register the profiling results.

documentation.label: Espacio de Datos
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos que contiene las tablas en donde se registrarn los resultados del perfilado.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set that contains the profiling summary table to register the profiling results.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set que contiene las tablas para registrar el resultado del perfilado de la columna.

documentation.label: Profile Summary Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the summarized profile results.

documentation.label: Tabla de Resumen de Perfilado
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr datos resumidos del resultado del perfilado, como nmero de valores distintos, patrones distintos, valores mximos, valores mnimos, etc.

documentation.label: Bytes per Buffer
documentation.description: This is a number of bytes that serves as a limit for the ammount of values that can be stored before sorting them and send them to a file.

documentation.label: Bytes por Buffer
documentation.description: Cantidad en bytes que sirve de lmite para saber en qu momento ordenar la data recolectada antes de enviarla a un archivo.

documentation.label: Message
documentation.description: Variable that contains messages that help to know details of how the process finished.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Output Column Directory Abs Path
documentation.description: Absolute Path of the working directory created to store sorted data.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Distinct Values
documentation.description: Indicates the ammount of distinct values found.

documentation.label: Valores Distintos
documentation.description: Indica la Cantidad de Valores distintos encontrados para la columna.

documentation.label: Distinct Patterns
documentation.description: Indicates the ammount of distinct Patterns found.

documentation.label: Patrones Distintos
documentation.description: Indica la Cantidad de Patrones distintos encontrados para la columna.

documentation.label: Distinct Lengths
documentation.description: Indicates the ammount of distinct value lengths found to store.

documentation.label: Longitudes de Valores Distintas
documentation.description: Indica la Cantidad de Longitudes de Valores distintas encontrados para la columna.

documentation.label: Distinct Special Characters
documentation.description: Indicates the ammount of distinct Special Characters found.

documentation.label: Caracteres Especiales Distintos
documentation.description: Indica la Cantidad de Caracteres Especiales distintos encontrados para la columna.

documentation.label: Run Data Cleansing On Table
documentation.description: Step that executes a Data Cleansing Configuration for a specified EBX Table.

documentation.label: Ejecuta Configuracin de Limpieza
documentation.description: Etapa que ejecuta la configuracin de limpieza de datos colocada sobre una tabla de EBX determinada.

documentation.label: Ejecuta Configuracin de Limpieza
documentation.description: Etapa que ejecuta la configuracin de limpieza de datos colocada sobre una tabla de EBX determinada.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space where the Technical Metadata Model is published.

documentation.label: Espacio de Datos
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos en el que se encuentra publicado el modelo de Metadatos Tcnicos.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set where the Technical Metadata Model is published.

documentation.label: Conjunto de Datos
documentation.description: Conjunto de Datos en el que se encuentra publicado el modelo de Metadatos Tcnicos.

documentation.label: Data Cleansing Configuration Id
documentation.description: The ID used to identify the Data Cleansing Configuration to use.

documentation.label: Id de Configuracin de Limpieza de Datos
documentation.description: Llave usada para identificar la configuracin de Limpieza de Datos a usar, esto normalmente es determinado por el servicio de usuario que lanza el workflow.

documentation.label: Blocks Before Merge
documentation.description: Integer number used to determine how many blocks of records should be commited to the current child data space before merging and reopening a new Child Data Space to continue working in parallel.

documentation.label: Bloques previos a combinacin
documentation.description: Nmero entero usado para determinar cuantos bloques de registros deberan confirmarse al actual espacio de datos hijo antes de combinarse con el padre para abrir un nuevo espacio de datos hijo en el cual seguir trabajando.

documentation.label: Number of Prefered Threads
documentation.description: Integer number used to provide a hint on the number of threads to use, it can not exceed the avalable processors to the VM - 2, and can not be less than or equal to 0, the default behaviour is to take all available processors minus 2, if this is not possible, then only 1 thread would be used.

documentation.label: Cantidad Preferida de Hilos
documentation.description: Nmero entero que indica una pista sobre la cantidad de hilos a usar para la limpieza de datos, no puede exeder la cantidad de procesadores disponibles para la mquina virtual, tampoco puede ser menor o igual que 0, en caso contrario, se usar la cantidad mxima de procesadores disponibles menos 2, si despus de la resta el nmero es 0 o menor solo se emplear un hilo.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: Integer number used to determine how many records should be collected before updating then in the target table.

documentation.label: Tamao del Batch
documentation.description: Tamao del Lote de registros a acumular antes de ejecutar el procedimiento de limpieza de datos para ellos y modificar la tabla, se contina acumulando y afectando la tabla en lotes de este nmero de registros.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: Integer number used to provide a hint to the underlying database on how many records to fetch at a time from the result of processing each request.

documentation.label: Tamao de Inspeccin
documentation.description: Nmero entero que indica una pista a la base de datos subyacente de cuantos registros preparar para recuperar como resultado de procesar cada peticin.

documentation.label: Commit Threshold
documentation.description: Integer number used to determine how many records should be processed before commit, remember that this value is multiplied by 256.

documentation.label: Umbral de Commit
documentation.description: Nmero usado para determinar cuntos registros son procesados en memoria antes de llevar a cabo un commit, recuerde que el valor se multiplica por 256. Si se especifica un 0, entonces solo se hace un commit despus de que todos los datos son procesados.

documentation.label: Stage Directory
documentation.description: File System Path to a directory where temporal data cleansing results will be stored as an intermediate stage prior to loading to the target table.

documentation.label: Directorio de Stage
documentation.description: Ruta del Sistema de Archivos a un directorio en donde se almacenarn temporalmente los resultados de la limpieza de datos como etapa intermedia previa a cargar los datos a la tabla destino.

documentation.label: XPath Filter Predicate
documentation.description: XPath Filter Predicate to determine the records to be affected.

documentation.label: Expresin de Filtro XPath
documentation.description: Es una expresin de estilo XPath para determinar los registros a afectar sobre la tabla de destino.

documentation.label: XPath Parameters
documentation.description: An expression with the form: $param1=value;$param2=value;$param3=value..., to specify the values that will be assign later (see XPath Parameter Types).

documentation.label: Parmetros XPath
documentation.description: Una expresin de la forma: $param1=value;$param2=value;$param3=value..., para especificar los valores que sern asignados posteriormente (vase Tipos de Dato de Parmetros XPath).

documentation.label: XPath Parameter Data Types
documentation.description: An expression with the form: $param1=int;$param2=date;$param3=dateandtime;$param4=time;$param5=decimal;$param6=boolean;$param7=string..., to specify the data type that each parameter value would have.

documentation.label: Tipos de Dato de Parmetros XPath
documentation.description: Una expresin de la forma: $param1=int;$param2=date;$param3=dateandtime;$param4=time;$param5=decimal;$param6=boolean;$param7=string..., para especificar el tipo de dato que cada parmetro tendr.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space where the target table is found.

documentation.label: Data Space de Destino
documentation.description: Data Space en donde se encuentra la tabla de destino.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Set
documentation.description: Target Table Data Set where the target table is found.

documentation.label: Data Set de Tabla Destino
documentation.description: Data Set en donde se encuentra la tabla de destino.

documentation.label: Target Table
documentation.description: Target table where to insert source records.

documentation.label: Tabla Destino
documentation.description: Tabla de destino en donde insertar registros.

documentation.label: Monitoring Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space where monitoring table is found.

documentation.label: Espacio de Datos de Monitoreo
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos de Monitoreo.

documentation.label: Monitoring Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set where monitoring table is found.

documentation.label: Conjunto de Datos de Monitoreo
documentation.description: Conjunto de datos en el que se encuentra la tabla de monitoreo.

documentation.label: Monitoring Table
documentation.description: Monitoring table. For each batch processed (see Batch Size), the task will update the corresponding record identified by the monitoring table and record parameters (see also Record Primary Key) with internal information to give a status about it's process.

documentation.label: Tabla de Monitoreo
documentation.description: Tabla de Monitoreo. Cada que se cumpla con un intervalo de ejecucin (batch, vase "Tamao de Batch"), se actualizar el registro especificado en la tabla por el valor de llave primaria indicado en el parmetro "Llave Primaria de Registro".

documentation.label: Monitoring Elapsed Time Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the elapsed time for a current processed, the corresponding column data type must be Decimal, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Tiempo Transcurrido
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el tiempo transcurrido, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser Decimal. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote).

documentation.label: Monitoring Processed Records Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the amount of records being processed, the corresponding column data type must be Decimal, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Cantidad de Registros Procesados
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar la cantidad actual de registros procesados, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser Decimal. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote).

documentation.label: Monitoring Process Type Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the process type. The corresponding column data type must be String, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Tipo de Proceso
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el nombre del tipo de proceso en ejecucin, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser Decimal. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote) o cada vez que se cumple el periodo establecido.

documentation.label: Monitoring Last Message Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the last relevant message during the last batch process. The corresponding column data type must be String, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de ltimo Mensaje
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el ltimo mensaje relevante durante el ltimo bloque de registros, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser String. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote).

documentation.label: Monitoring Status Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the process execution status. The corresponding column data type must be String, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Estatus de Monitoreo
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el estatus del progreso de la ejecucin, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser String. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote).

documentation.label: Monitoring Total Records Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the total records to be processed. The corresponding column data type must be Decimal, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Total de Registros
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el total de registros a procesar, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser Decimal. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote).

documentation.label: Monitoring Progress Percentage Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify the porcentaje de avance de procesamiento de registros. The corresponding column data type must be String, the value is updated each time a batch is commited.

documentation.label: Columna de Porcentaje de Avance
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar el porcentaje de avance de registros procesados, el tipo de dato en la tabla de EBX debe ser Decimal. El valor se actualiza cada vez que se procesa un bloque de datos completo (segn el Tamao de Lote) o cada vez que se cumple el periodo establecido.

documentation.label: Monitoring Tag Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify a tag to have more information about the running process.

documentation.label: Columna de Etiqueta de Monitoreo
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar una etiqueta para identificar con mayor precisin en proceso en ejecucin o que corri.

documentation.label: Monitoring Manual Stop Field
documentation.description: Column name within the monitoring table to specify if the process being monitored should stop, this value needs to be set manually at any time.

documentation.label: Columna de Detencin de Proceso
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se especificar que el proceso actualmente bajo vigilancia debe parar.

documentation.label: Owner User or Role ID
documentation.description: The name (nor label) that corresponds to a user or role to be set as the owner for the child data spaces created during data cleansing.

documentation.label: ID de Usuario o Rol Propietario
documentation.description: El nombre (no la etiqueta) correspondiente al usuario o rol que ser designado como el dueo de los espacios de datos hijos durante el proceso de limpieza.

documentation.label: Primary Key
documentation.description: Monitoring table primary record to write progress information about a running process. If this is not specified, then a new record will be created in the table to be updated with reporting data each time a batch is completed or the period time is reached.

documentation.label: Tabla Destino
documentation.description: Llave primaria del registro en la tabla de monitoreo en donde se colocar la informacin de avance de un proceso en ejecucin, si no se especifica, un nuevo registro ser creado y en l se actualizar la informacin.

documentation.label: Reporting Period
documentation.description: Number of milliseconds to establish a period reporting.

documentation.label: Periodo de Reporte
documentation.description: Nmero de milisegundos despus del cul se actualizar el registro de la tabla de Monitoreo.

documentation.label: Etiqueta
documentation.description: A tag to identify the process that would be running.

documentation.label: Etiqueta
documentation.description: Una etiqueta para identificar mejor el proceso que estara en ejecucin.

documentation.label: Progress Temp Log Dir
documentation.description: File System Path to a directory where status progress for a record configuration cleansing process would be recorded.

documentation.label: Archivo Temporal de Log de Progreso
documentation.description: Ruta del Sistema de Archivos a una carpeta en la cual ser escrito el progreso de un proceso en ejecucin de limpieza determinado.

documentation.label: Messages
documentation.description: Variable that contains messages that help to know details of how the process finished.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Total Records Processed
documentation.description: Indicates how many records were processed.

documentation.label: Total de Registros Procesados
documentation.description: Indica la Cantidad de registros que fueron procesados.

documentation.label: Column Profile Top Values Upload
documentation.description: Process of selecting the indicated top values to upload them to EBX to have a sample for the data.

documentation.label: Carga de Valores "Top" de Perfilado de Columna
documentation.description: Proceso de seleccin de los primeros valores de cada elemento "Valor", "Patrn" y "Caracteres Especiales" para cargarlos a EBX (ordenados de manera descendente por frecuencia).

documentation.label: Field Foreign Key Value
documentation.description: A field record foreign key value that comes from EBX Metadata Data Space to which the column profiling results would be attached.

documentation.label: Llave Foranea de Columna
documentation.description: Valor de llave foranea de columna en EBX a la cul sern relacionados los resultados del perfilado.

documentation.label: Database Column
documentation.description: Column to be profiled.

documentation.label: Columna
documentation.description: Columna a ser Perfilada.

documentation.label: Top Values
documentation.description: The number that indicates how many first values will be taken from the sorted set of each "Values", "Patterns" and "Special Characters" files to be uploaded to EBX.

documentation.label: Top de Valores
documentation.description: Nmero que indica los primeros valores a ser tomados de "Valores", "Patrones" y "Caracteres Especiales" a ser cargados en EBX.

documentation.label: Tokenization Catalog Table
documentation.description: Indicates the XPath to the Table where specific tokenization catalog table per field is defined.

documentation.label: Tabla Catlogo de Tokenizacin
documentation.description: Especifica el XPath hacia la tabla que especifica particularmente cul catlogo de tokenizacin se debe aplicar a una columna dada.

documentation.label: Cat Token Data Space Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the data space name where the token catalog resides that would be used to tokenize the values found within the column.

documentation.label: Columna de Espacio de Datos de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el nombre Espacio de Datos que contendr la tabla catlogo de tokenizacin a usar durante el perfilamiento para encontrar patrones contextuales.

documentation.label: Cat Token Data Set Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the data set identifier to indicate where the token catalog resides that would be used to tokenize the values found within the column.

documentation.label: Data Set de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica el identificador Data Set que contendr la tabla catlogo de tokenizacin a usar durante el perfilamiento para encontrar patrones contextuales.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Field
documentation.description: The field name that contains the Cat Token Table path to the table that contains the contextual tokens to be used to define patterns within the data when profiling.

documentation.label: Tabla de Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Columna que indica la ruta hacia la tabla de Catlogo de Tokens que contendrn la representacin contextual a usar en los datos durante el perfilado para detectar patrones e informacin acicional.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Data Field
documentation.description: Field within the Cat Token Table that contains the data value.

documentation.label: Columna de Dato del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna de la tabla del catlogo de tokens que conteiene el dato.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table Token Field
documentation.description: Field within the Cat Token Table that contains the token value.

documentation.label: Columna de Token del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna de la tabla del catlogo de tokens que conteiene el token para el dato correspondiente.

documentation.label: Cat Token Table FK
documentation.description: The field name that contains the foreign key to the "Field" table to associate the specific tokenization table to the column when profiling.

documentation.label: Columna de Llave Fornea del Catlogo de Tokens
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que contiene la llave fornea hacia la tabla "Columna" para asociar la tabla de tokenizacin al perfilar.

documentation.label: Default Token Data Space
documentation.description: Data Space to use as default for a data tokenization catalog.

documentation.label: Data Space de Token Predeterminado
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos predeterminado para el catlogo de tokenizacin de datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set to use as default for a data tokenization catalog.

documentation.label: Data Set de Token Predeterminado
documentation.description: Conjunto de Datos predeterminado para el catlogo de tokenizacin de datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Table
documentation.description: Data Tokenization Catalog to use as default.

documentation.label: Tabla de Tokenizacin Predeterminada
documentation.description: Tabla de Tokenizacin Predeterminada a usar para el perfilado de Datos.

documentation.label: Default Token Table Data Field
documentation.description: The field within the default catalog token table that contains the data for which a specific token is specified.

documentation.label: Columna Dato de Tabla de Tokens Predeterminada
documentation.description: La columna de que contiene el dato para el cual se especifica un token dentro del catlogo de tokenizacin predeterminado.

documentation.label: Default Token Table Token Field
documentation.description: The field within the default catalog token table that contains the token for the corresponding data values.

documentation.label: Columna Token Tabla de Tokens Predeterminada
documentation.description: La columna de que contiene el token que se especifica para un valor dentro del catlogo de tokenizacin predeterminado.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: EBX data space (perhaps relational) that contains the top values table to register the profiling results.

documentation.label: Espacio de Datos
documentation.description: Espacio de Datos (al parecer relacional) que contiene las tablas en donde se registrarn los valores top del resultados del perfilado.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set that contains the profiling top values table to register the profiling results.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: Data Set que contiene las tablas para registrar los valores top del resultado del perfilado de la columna.

documentation.label: Values Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the top values by frequency (desc) from the column profiling result.

documentation.label: Tabla de Valores
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr los valores ms frecuentes segn se haya indicado en el parmetro "Valores Top" por campo perfilado.

documentation.label: Patterns Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the top patterns by frequency (desc) from the column profiling result.

documentation.label: Tabla de Patrones
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr los patrones ms frecuentes segn se haya indicado en el parmetro "Valores Top" por campo perfilado.

documentation.label: Value Lengths Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the top value lengths by frequency (desc) from the column profiling result.

documentation.label: Tabla de Longitudes de Valores
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr las longitudes de valores ms frecuentes segn se haya indicado en el parmetro "Valores Top" por campo perfilado.

documentation.label: Special Characters Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the top Special Characters by frequency (desc) from the column profiling result.

documentation.label: Tabla de Patrones
documentation.description: Esta tabla contendr los caracteres especiales ms frecuenctes segn se haya indicado en el parmetro "Valores Top" por campo perfilado.

documentation.label: Foreign Key Column Name to Field Table
documentation.description: This table will contain the top Special Characters by frequency (desc) from the column profiling result.

documentation.label: Columna de llave Foranea a Tabla Columna
documentation.description: Nombre de la columna que es llave fornea a la tabla de Columnas.

documentation.label: Message
documentation.description: Variable that contains messages that help to know details of how the process finished.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Output Column Directory Abs Path
documentation.description: Absolute Path of the working directory created to store sorted data.

documentation.label: Mensaje
documentation.description: Variable que contiene informacin sobre cmo finaliz el proceso.

documentation.label: Collect Metadata from XML File
documentation.description: This script collects an XML file Metadata.

documentation.label: File Name with Extension
documentation.description: This should be pointing to a valid file that is intended to be processed.

documentation.label: Data Space
documentation.description: This data space where tables reside to hold metadata collected.

documentation.label: Data Set
documentation.description: This is the data set where tables reside to hold metadata collected.

documentation.label: Table XML File Path
documentation.description: Table path to where a processed file would be registered.

documentation.label: Table XML Element Path
documentation.description: Table path to where Entity Information from XML file will be stored.

documentation.label: Table XML Attribute Path
documentation.description: Table path to where Attribute and Namespace information will be stored.

documentation.label: Table XML Content Path
documentation.description: Table path to a table with a full semantic model that sacrifices matching capabilities for centralized and rich structure.

documentation.label: File Path
documentation.description: Complete path to a file to be processed, "File Name with Extension" should be empty for this option to be taken into account.

documentation.label: Split set size
documentation.description: This option indicates how many distinct values should be included for the search index pages.

documentation.label: Messages from process
documentation.description: In this variable are some process messages.

documentation.label: Execute SQL Mapping
documentation.description: This script executes a SQL Import Table Mapping.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the target table Data Space.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Set
documentation.description: Here goes the target table data set identificator.

documentation.label: Target Table Path
documentation.description: The target table path to feed with data within the specified Dataspace - Dataset.

documentation.label: Source Table Schema Name
documentation.description: In the source system: the schema name where the source table is located.

documentation.label: Use Free Query
documentation.description: This will indicate the script task to execute the content of "Source Table or View" parameter as a SQL Statement that produces a result set, then, according to the query projection, the underlying mapping will take effect. If this property is specified, then "Filter Predicate" will be ignored, but if "Field for Incremental Loading" is specified, then an automatic filter will be appended to the subquery.

documentation.label: Source Table or View
documentation.description: The source table or view identifier within the table schema.

documentation.label: Filter Predicate
documentation.description: This is the filter predicate used to filter source data. (Example: year(sample_datetime) = year(getDate()) and month(sample_datetime) = month(getDate()) and day(sample_datetime) = day(getDate())) Check the source database syntax to place the appropriate filter as desired.

documentation.label: SQL Application Name
documentation.description: This is an identifier within Data Exchange Add-On Configuration that identifies the configuration to the Default SQL Application to use as source.

documentation.label: EBX Application Name
documentation.description: This is an identifier within Data Exchange Add-On Configuration that identifies the EBX application configuration to the target EBX Table.

documentation.label: Data Source Name
documentation.description: This is the Data Source Name. This should be one of the Data Source configuration names found within Data Exchange Addon Data Set -> Reference Data -> SQL data source.

documentation.label: Field Mappings
documentation.description:
This field is specified by source - target pairs, each pair being separated by 
 (literally a backslash followed by a letter n), each pair is specified like in the following example: source:name="SOURCE_FIELD_NAME";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH",type="string", therefor, if a second field needs to be specified, then the following example applies: source:name="SOURCE_FIELD_NAME";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH_1",type="string"
source:name="SOURCE_FIELD_NAME_2";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH_2",type="string". Valid target type values are: int, string, decimal, date, time, timestamp and boolean, also, if specifying a date or time like data type, an extra attribute on the right side is allowed (added by placing a comma as separator) called: date_format, then a format like java SimpleDateFormat is allowed, example: source:name="SOURCE_TIMESTAMP_FIELD_NAME";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH_DATE_AND_TIME",type="timestamp",date_format="yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS", moreover, if the target field is a foreign key and the source value needs to be searched in a reference table, then the following extra attributes on the right side are valid: ref_data_space, ref_data_set, ref_table and ref_table_field, this allows to use a single field value to be searched in a specified EBX table to allow the task to change the value into the corresponding foreign key value before writing it to the target, if no match is found, then the raw value would be attempted to be written in the field, an example would be: source:name="SOURCE_TIMESTAMP_FIELD_NAME";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH_DATE_AND_TIME",type="timestamp",date_format="yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS"
source:name="SOURCE_FIELD_NAME_2";target:name="TARGET/EBX/FIELD/RELATIVE/PATH_2",type="string",ref_data_space="DataSpaceIdentifier",ref_data_set="DataSetUniqueName",ref_table="/root/path/to/table/in/dataset",ref_table_field="relative/field/path", a properly formatted primary key value corresponding to the first match found will be returned.

documentation.label: Source Table Primary Key
documentation.description: This are the fields at source table that are the primary key to be evaluated against the corresponding fields in the target table to know if the record is an update or an insert. These fields need to have a mapping in "fieldMappings".

documentation.label: Field for Incremental Loading
documentation.description: This field should be a datetime or date field to be used to filter out new records from the source table.

documentation.label: Stage to Temp File
documentation.description: A literal of "true" (without double quotes), indicates to write contents from the database to a temp file before performing data loading into EBX table according to this script task configuration. Any other value including empty string, would result into directly loading the data to EBX table. This approach would be useful in case of large processing times and a short connection period to the database.

documentation.label: Temp Directory
documentation.description: When using the attribute "Stage to Temp File", this file system path would be used to store the temp data.

documentation.label: Fetch Size
documentation.description: This is the amount of records to read and keep in memory at a time from the source.

documentation.label: Batch Size
documentation.description: This is the amount of records to be group together for insertion in the target table.

documentation.label: Created Records
documentation.description: Records Created During the Process.

documentation.label: Updated Records
documentation.description: Records Updated During the Process.

documentation.label: Deleted Records
documentation.description: Records Deleted During the Process.

documentation.label: Invalid Records
documentation.description: Records Invalid During the Process.

documentation.label: Processed Records
documentation.description: Records Processed.

documentation.label: Execute Internal Mapping
documentation.description: This script executes an Internal EBX Table Mapping.

documentation.label: Source Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the source table data space.

documentation.label: Source Table Data Set
documentation.description: Here goes the source table data set identifier.

documentation.label: Source Table Path
documentation.description: The table path to get data from.

documentation.label: Filter Predicate
documentation.description: This is the filter predicate used to filter source data. (Example: ./ID>$param1 and ./group/field=$param2)

documentation.label: Filter data values
documentation.description: This is the filter value mappings to specify the values. (Example: $param1=value1;$param2=value2) "value1" or "value2" can be any charset sequence except the pattern \$[a-zA-Z0-9]+\=, there should be support for escaping in the future.

documentation.label: Filter parameter data types
documentation.description: This is the filter data type parameter mappings. (Example: $param1=int;$param2=string) Supported data types are: date, time, dateandtime, int, decimal, string.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Space
documentation.description: This is the target table Data Space.

documentation.label: Target Table Data Set
documentation.description: Here goes the target table data set identificator.

documentation.label: Target Table Path
documentation.description: The target table path to feed with data within the specified target Dataspace - target Dataset.

documentation.label: Field Mappings
